title: GH-2: Upgrade docs/ to constitutions standard
description:
Upgrade the docs/ directory from the old YAML layout to the latest constitutions standard so that mage analyze passes without errors. Currently 20+ schema validation errors across VISION.yaml, ARCHITECTURE.yaml, road-map.yaml, all 10 PRDs, and all 7 test suites.

GitHub: petar-djukic/crumbs#2

title: Fix VISION.yaml schema
description:
Migrate VISION.yaml to the current VisionDoc struct format.

Required Reading:
- cobbler-scaffold reference VISION.yaml
- Go struct: orchestrator/context.go (VisionDoc, Phase, Risk)
- Current file: docs/VISION.yaml

Requirements:
- Convert success_criteria from array of objects to map[string]string
- Add related_projects array (project, role fields)
- Fix implementation_phases: remove name field, use string phase IDs, convert deliverables from array to multiline string
- Verify Risk fields match struct

Acceptance Criteria:
- mage analyze shows no errors for docs/VISION.yaml
